title: naada tatva
sahitya:
nAda tatva vinOda vidhvat jnAnamE jnAnam manamE praNava

anupallavi
 
Odu muttamizh vEda vittaka mAdavattar manOlaya muTrezhu ghananaya

caraNam
 
sakala lOkAdhAra shankara parAshakti tandaruL kumara sadguruparAtpara
krpAkara vara kavi kunjaradAsa manOhara sapta svaravara
